name: Planetary Timeloop
description:
Planetary Timeloop

You have a starship, you have a goal - find all five keys. Everything changes with every minute. It's a clockwork game, like Majora's Mask, if you know it.

Controls: 

WS, AD, QE to rotate the starship
Space to propel forward
Backspace to respawn
Mouse movement scrollwheel and Esc to control camera

Made by Filip Novotny (Quadratic Games) for Trijam #121. Theme: Exploration of space and time. 

(I didn't really implement all what was planned, such as actually doing something with the keys or intro scene or braking or... we all know this, it's Trijam.)

Premade things used: Force field shader, some sfx from freesound.org, one my old song, Godot Engine, Blender
